items.content_html: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.
items.title: haoxiang-xu/PuPu: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: Parks & Rec Backend is a lightweight Express.js + SQLite3 backend designed to handle program registrations for public users and program management for admin users. Public users can sign up and pay for programs, while admin users can oversee program details and access rosters.
items.title: aRonnieAlsop/parks_and_rec_backend: Parks & Rec Backend is a lightweight Express.js + SQLite3 backend designed to handle program registrations for public users and program management for admin users. Public users can sign up and pay for programs, while admin users can oversee program details and access rosters.

items.title: WhiskeySockets/Baileys: Lightweight full-featured typescript/javascript WhatsApp Web API

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight, fast, and powerful global state management library for modern React.js projects.
items.title: react18-tools/kosha: A modern, lightweight, fast, and powerful global state management library for modern React.js projects.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
items.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
